com.flowpowered.caustic.api.data

Class ShaderSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.caustic.api.data.ShaderSource

  • public class ShaderSource
extends Object
    Represents the source of a shader. This class can be used to load a source from an input stream, and provides pre-compilation functionality such as parsing shader type, attribute layout and texture layout tokens. These tokens can be used to declare various parameters directly in the shader code instead of in the software code, which simplifies loading.

    • Constructor Summary

      ShaderSource(CharSequence source)
      Constructs a new shader source from the character sequence.
      ShaderSource(InputStream source)
      Constructs a new shader source from the input stream.

      • ShaderSource

        public ShaderSource(CharSequence source)
        Constructs a new shader source from the character sequence.
        Parameters:
        source - The shader source

    • Method Detail

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete()
        Returns true if the shader source is complete and ready to be used in a Shader object, false if otherwise. If this method returns false, than information such as the type is missing.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the shader source is complete

      • getSource

        public CharSequence getSource()
        Returns the raw character sequence source of this shader source.
        Returns:
        The raw source

      • getType

        public Shader.ShaderType getType()
        Returns the type of this shader. If the type was declared in the source using a shader type token, it will have been loaded from it. Else this returns null and it must be set manually using setType(com.flowpowered.caustic.api.gl.Shader.ShaderType).
        Returns:
        The shader type, or null if not set

      • setType

        public void setType(Shader.ShaderType type)
        Sets the shader type. It's not necessary to do this manually if it was declared in the source using a shader type token.
        Parameters:
        type - The shader type

      • getAttributeLayouts

        public gnu.trove.map.TObjectIntMap<String> getAttributeLayouts()
        Returns the attribute layouts, either parsed from the source or set manually using setAttributeLayout(String, int).
        Returns:
        The attribute layouts

      • getTextureLayouts

        public gnu.trove.map.TIntObjectMap<String> getTextureLayouts()
        Returns the texture layouts, either parsed from the source or set manually using setTextureLayout(int, String).
        Returns:
        The texture layouts

      • setAttributeLayout

        public void setAttributeLayout(String attribute,
                               int layout)
        Sets an attribute layout.
        Parameters:
        attribute - The name of the attribute
        layout - The layout for the attribute

      • setTextureLayout

        public void setTextureLayout(int unit,
                             String sampler)
        Sets a texture layout.
        Parameters:
        unit - The unit for the sampler
        sampler - The sampler name
